name: One More Chance II GameHighedJam 2021
description:
This game very hard game! just like your life!  :)

CREDİT

Uğur Filiz : Game Developer & Grafik Designer

Emirhan Berber : Game Developer

Mert Hacıbektaşoğlu : 2D Artist

IN-GAME CONTROLS

W & SPACE : Jump

Z : Shoot

Designed by Agile Game Studio for Game HighedJam in 12 hours. We wish you enjoyable games.
